overview: As the assistant of superstar Wanren, Lin Yang has always dreamed of becoming an actor. When he finally gets his hard earned opportunity, he becomes replaced by others at the last minute. Lin Yang saves Wan Ren at the set, but by doing so he hurts his face. Wan Ren fires Lin Yang, and only after he meets Wan Jun, a sweet girl, and gets plastic surgery it seems his dreams can be attained.
title: The Rule of Cosmetic
